data.description: SpamCopURI is a plugin to Mail::SpamAssassin
data.similar:
None known. URIDNSBL will be available with SA 3.0, but will only
    work with SA 3.0. Nothing exists for 2.63.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module depends on Mail::SpamAssassin being installed and
    actually patches two of the files released with Mail::SpamAssassin.
    Its basically a plugin and doesn't seem to belong anywhere else.
